SEARCH

All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
CFconverter
This class provides a method to convert a given temperature in Celsius to its equivalent in Fahrenheit.
ConverterBehaviour
The ConverterBehaviour interface defines the behavior required for conversion classes.
FCconverter
This class provides a method to convert a given temperature in Fahrenheit to its equivalent in Celsius.
KLconverter
This class provides a method to convert a given distance in kilometers to its equivalent in miles.
MIconventer
This class provides a method to convert a given distance in miles to its equivalent in kilometers.
UnitConverter
The UnitConverter class provides a flexible way to convert various units using different behaviors.
UnitConverterTest
The UnitConverterTest class is a test class for the UnitConverter class and various conversion behaviors.
